message.content:
{"id": "21834", 
"title": "Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout", 
"description": "The coolbar layout is corrupted when deleting items. Build 2002071610021.", 
"OB": "1. Run the attached test case. 2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem). 3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, putting it after the Open Type item. 4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Launch coolitem. 5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), putting it after the Search coolitem. 6. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs. The second row should remain.", 
"EB": "1. Run the attached test case. 2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row. 3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Script item. 4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Launch coolitem. 5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Search coolitem.", 
"SR": "The second row should remain intact after deleting items from the coolbar."}
